We must be much more with God in earnest prayer. We must make God our only trust. The Lord is our God, the strength of our soul. We must take hold upon the Lord. The Lord is pleased when we importune Him for His grace and His favor, not only for ourselves but for those who are in need of help. Oh let us put implicit confidence in our Lord Jesus. Now pray, and believe, and 


                                    -380- 

pray, and the Lord will certainly hear us.--Letter 403, 1906, pp. 1, 2. (To Brother Magan, February 10, 1906.) 

Released March 11, 1975.
